column2: "Welcome back! Did you come up with any ideas about my lighting problem? Oh, thank you!"
"Hmm, so you think we should braid a rope into weird shapes, wrap it around a blue glass ball and light that up from the inside...?"
"...Oh, that would be so romantic! It would be like a sparkling blue ocean! That would set the mood, alright!"
"In a wonderful environment like that, with everyone together, people would start reminiscing in no time!"
"I've never made anything like this before, but I'll get to work right away! Look forward to seeing it in action!"
